tasks.description: Add /goodbye endpoint to api/app.py that returns a JSON response with a goodbye message following the same pattern as the existing /hello endpoint

acceptance_criteria.given: The Flask API server is running
acceptance_criteria.when: A GET request is sent to /goodbye
acceptance_criteria.then: A 200 JSON response is returned with a goodbye message field

tasks.description: Update ui/app.js to fetch the goodbye message from /goodbye and display it alongside the hello message in the UI

acceptance_criteria.given: The /goodbye endpoint returns a valid response
acceptance_criteria.when: The UI page loads in a browser
acceptance_criteria.then: The goodbye message is fetched and displayed in the page

tasks.description: Add pytest tests for the /goodbye endpoint verifying JSON response format and content

acceptance_criteria.given: The /goodbye endpoint is implemented in api/app.py
acceptance_criteria.when: pytest is executed against the test suite
acceptance_criteria.then: All tests pass verifying the /goodbye endpoint returns correct JSON with a goodbye message
